display_help: The MERF (Micro-Emitter Repulsor Field) combines the best qualities of unobtrusive installation with high-energy repulsion generation. When activated, the MERF releases a powerful non-damaging charge capable of flinging opponents away.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
